page.title: 13HELSBY HILLSIDE C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: In the area of study there is only one primary school and that is Helsby Hillside.Its position is between Bates Lane and Chester Road.The school is surrounded by two playgrounds. It is made up of three buildings.The first building contains two classrooms,only one is in use.The main building has five classrooms and a hall where meal time takes place and a kitchen where the meals are made.There are separate cloakrooms for infants and juniors .Near to one playground is a demountable which is soon to be demolished. In class we do Maths and English in which we write a story of some sort.In craft we make things with different materials and in P.E we play different sports and games. We also do music,history and geography.
